Document.li: Pop - this shows the population of your residences. This figure does not include the homeless.
Housed - this shows the total number of people in your city that live in residences.
Housed % - this shows the percentage of your city that live in residences.
Shanties - this shows the number of shanty towns in your city.
Unn Dths - this shows the number of people that died through starvation or from pollution in the last month.
Unemp % - this shows the percentage of your population that is unemployed.
Starv % - this shows the percentage of your population that is starving.
Document.p: Left clicking on this window will cycle through windows for finance, other costs and housing.
